metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a comprehensive literature review focusing on methodologies, datasets, and performance benchmarks for Graph Neural Networks in Drug Discovery

subsection_analysis.refined_text: We propose a novel Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) architecture specifically designed for molecular property prediction in drug discovery applications.
The model incorporates attention mechanisms to focus on chemically relevant substructures within molecular graphs.
Our dataset comprises 150,000 molecular compounds from ChEMBL database with associated bioactivity measurements.
Data preprocessing includes molecular standardization, removal of salts, and generation of 2D molecular graphs using RDKit.
Performance evaluation uses standard metrics including AUC-ROC, precision, recall, and F1-score for classification tasks.
